can you tell me some distro that has a purpose to act as an gateway? like ipcop and such
i use monowall, very small and nice
personally, i use it as an IPSec gateway
how is the driver support? i mean, will it find my ethernets? =))
I never had trouble with it, it's a fairly low-traffic environment, but it runs well on some pII 233MHz or so
strang, i cant find the image-file
i found the driver support like linux in general, fairly good with a few misses here and there
yes, but there is a live cd that makes things easier
